author: adrianc
msg: Removed deprecated CSS style sepBar, removed unnecessary align="left" HTML element attributes.

I did a global search and replace for the align="left" aatribute - I didn't check each replacement because there were hundreds of them. This shouldn't break any layout. If you spot something wrong, post a message on the dev mailing list and I will fix it.
